summary: Using illicit drugs and misusing prescription drugs have been persistent issues in the U.S., causing over 100,000 deaths a year from 2021-2023. We convened a forum with 12 experts to discuss developing and evaluating media campaigns intended to prevent drug misuse. The experts said that, to create campaigns, people should: Identify, understand, and target the audience they intend to reach Select messengers and delivery methods...
title: Office of National Drug Control Policy: Experts' Views on Developing and Evaluating Media Campaigns Intended to Prevent Drug Misuse
